short_summary: Alterations of Canada Border Services Agency Vessel
description: The contractor must carry out the work, maintenance and alterations of the Canada Border Services Agency Vessel at the Quai Richelieu Detachment in accordance with the solicitation and its attached documents.
full_summary:
=====================

**RFP 47419-243749: Alterations of CBSA Vessel at Quai Richelieu Detachment**

---

**Solicitation Details**

| Category | Description |
| :------- | :---------- |
| Solicitation Number | WS4419392969 |
| Reference Number | WS4419392969-Doc4419680562 |
| Publication Date | January 31, 2024 |
| Tender Closing Date | February 21, 2024 (2:00 PM EST) |
| Expected Contract Start Date | N/A |
| Expected Contract End Date | March 31, 2024 |

---

**Tender Status**

* The tender opportunity has been cancelled.

---

**Procurement Category**

* Government institution

---

**Procurement Method**

* Competitive; Open bidding

---

**Trade Agreements**

* The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies.

---

**Regions of Opportunity**

No locations specified.

---

**Regions of Delivery**

* Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
* Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)
* New Brunswick
* National Capital Region
* Nova Scotia
* Prince Edward Island

---

**Notice and Contact Information**

* Solicitation Notice: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18658274?extsite=MTg2NTgyNzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18658274?extsite=MTg2NTgyNzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Point of Contact: Haitham Abbas (SPAC/PSPC), haitham.abbas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

---

**Tender Requirements**

The successful contractor must perform the required alterations, maintenance, and work on the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) Vessel at the Quai Richelieu Detachment, in accordance with the solicitation documents and attached specifications.

**Important Notes**

* The tender closing time has been amended to February 21, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST.
* Submit all required supporting documentation and responses by the specified closing time. Submissions received after the closing time will be considered non-responsive. 

This is but a mere rewriting. No information was left out, but it certainly looks more professional. Thanks for helping me out if this was what was desired.
